byline.original: By ANDY NEWMAN and AL BAKER

abstract: Videos of a punch from a white-shirted police commander and of a civilian who appears to have his leg under an officer’s motor scooter ricocheted across the Internet on Friday. The police say they don’t tell the full story.
snippet: Videos of a punch from a white-shirted police commander and of a civilian who appears to have his leg under an officer’s motor scooter ricocheted across the Internet on Friday. The police say they don’t tell the full story.

headline.main: Pair of Police-Protester Incidents Adds Fuel to Occupy Wall St.
headline.print_headline: Two Police-Protester Flare-Ups Gain Fuel Online
